medical_history.chief_complaint: 4-month history of unexplained abdominal pain and diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began 4 months prior to presentation, with subsequent two hospitalizations for intestinal pseudo-obstruction.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes mellitus diagnosed at 20 years of age; hearing loss diagnosed at 27 years of age.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of diabetes mellitus in the patient's mother and her brother.
